summary: Diff adds a composed single-page GutOptim landing page with all major sections, repeated orange CTAs via a shared CtaButton, sticky header navigation with smooth scrolling, and a mobile sticky bottom CTA bar. However, it also introduces Internet Identity/auth-related hooks and provider wiring (a stated non-goal / immutable-path constraint), and includes unrequested footer attribution/disclaimer content. Mobile safe-area handling is referenced but not evidenced as implemented in CSS.

missing_requirements.requirement: Sticky mobile bottom “Buy Now” bar should include appropriate spacing/safe-area handling so it doesn’t obstruct key content.
missing_requirements.reason: MobileStickyCtaBar uses a `safe-area-bottom` class, but no corresponding utility/style is shown in the provided CSS, so safe-area handling is not evidenced as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider and actor wiring included in the app (non-goal) and changes appear in immutable paths.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists Internet Identity authentication/user accounts as non-goals and marks these hook files and main.tsx as immutable/no-edit, yet the diff adds InternetIdentityProvider usage and includes II/actor hooks.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any requirement; adds external promotional link/tracking.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes FDA-style supplement disclaimer text.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in requirements; adds additional compliance/disclaimer copy beyond specified sections.
